name: School Bus Adventure - Field Trip is a Fun 3D Driving Cartoon Game for Boys and Girls with simple Drag Control, where you can Explore Towns and Farms with Animals
name_original: School Bus Adventure - Field Trip is a Fun 3D Driving Cartoon Game for Boys and Girls with simple Drag Control, where you can Explore Towns and Farms with Animals
description:
A real symbol comes alive and turns into a legend!

A lot of kids already traveled in big, yellow School buses, others just saw them on TV or in a movie. The ”Big Yellow” vehicle is always the destination of some happenings: sometimes funny ones other times exciting or interesting ones. And The School Buses are in the best memories of all families.

Now it's the first time when you can try out yourself driving the big, yellow vehicle. You go on a field trip with kids, you must visit museums, mountains for excursions, so you'll find special tools during your journey. Signs for museums, binoculars, butterfly nets are to be found and of course the challenge includes maps, compasses, magnifying glasses, mountaineering and a lot of other adventures. A real family adventure at your fingertips!

This is a vehicle driving game, even it's intended for kids or to families. The action and the traffic is constant, so your skills will be very much needed to get as far as possible. Even children from kindergarten will understand how easy control the big, yellow vehicle, so School Bus Adventure - Filed Trip is even casual, all kids families will love it.


FEATURES

- Cartoon graphics covering arcade simulation aspects
- Never before experienced school bus driving fun
- Endless gameplay
- Unmatched environment for field trip destinations
- Different challenges: bottlenecks, contraflow, moving machinery, traffic, motorcycles, etc...
- Intuitive control methods: direct control using your fingers. Alternate controls with relative touch.
- 3D Environment
- Village environment with it's inhabitants, buildings and machinery followed by highway environment with traffic, vehicles and obstacles, farm environment with animals
- Lots of powerups: Slow Motion, Coin Magnet, Shield, etc.
- Different skins for your vehicle for added gaming fun.

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
